data.lyric:
[ti:Cool]

[00:00.00]Cool - Jonas Brothers (乔纳斯兄弟)
[00:00.18]Lyrics by：Ryan Tedder/Zach Skelton/Joe Jonas/Nick Jonas/Kevin Jonas/Casey Smith
[00:00.36]Composed by：Ryan Tedder/Zach Skelton/Joe Jonas/Nick Jonas/Kevin Jonas/Casey Smith
[00:00.54]I'm feeling so cool
[00:02.93]From top to the bottom just cool
[00:05.96]Every little thing that I do
[00:08.95]Well d**mit I'm feelin' so cool yeah
[00:14.05]Woke up feelin' like a new James Dean
[00:16.84]I comb my hair like an old school sheen
[00:19.98]I'm feelin' high like a late night summer of last year yeah
[00:26.06]Standin' there with the red dress on ya
[00:29.05]A Killer Queen like a young Jane Fonda
[00:32.05]Is it me or am I just havin' a good year?
[00:36.43]Lately I've been feelin' so cool cool
[00:39.40]Top to the bottom just cool cool
[00:42.43]Every little thing that I do do
[00:45.44]D**mit I'm feelin' so coo-oo-oo-oo-oo-ool
[00:49.85]It's like ooh
[00:50.76]Ooh maybe I should bottle my moves moves
[00:54.35]Sell 'em for a dollar or two two
[00:57.69]D**mit I'm feeling so coo-oo-oo-oo-oo-ool
[01:02.47]Must've done something right 'cause all these
[01:05.44]Lights are green man they look like palm trees
[01:08.45]And every time that song comes on it's about me
[01:12.34]Oh I feel like Post Malone when I get home
[01:17.15]Sittin' there winning like it's Game of Thrones
[01:19.96]And now that we've made it
[01:21.74]How complicated was last year?
[01:25.12]Lately I've been feelin' so cool cool
[01:27.92]Top to the bottom just cool cool
[01:30.93]Every little thing that I do do
[01:33.95]D**mit I'm feelin' so coo-oo-oo-oo-oo-ool
[01:38.27]It's like ooh ooh
[01:40.05]Maybe I should bottle my moves moves
[01:43.08]Sell 'em for a dollar or two two
[01:46.01]'Cause d**mit I'm feeling so coo-oo-oo-oo-oo-ool
[01:51.25]Cool cool cool
[02:03.45]Woke up feelin' like a new James dean
[02:06.15]I comb my hair like an old school sheen
[02:09.17]When I grow up I wanna be just like me
[02:13.57]Lately I've been feelin' so cool cool
[02:18.11]Top to the bottom just cool cool
[02:21.12]Every little thing that I do do
[02:24.05]D**mit I'm feelin' so coo-oo-oo-oo-oo-ool
[02:28.27]It's like ooh ooh
[02:30.20]Maybe I should bottle my moves moves
[02:33.15]Sell 'em for a dollar or two two
[02:36.19]'Cause d**mit I'm feeling so coo-oo-oo-oo-oo-ool
[02:43.88]Cool
data.trans:
[ti:Cool]
[ar:Jonas Brothers]
[al:Cool]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:00.18]//
[00:00.36]//
[00:00.54]我身心舒畅
[00:02.93]从头到脚 都很舒爽
[00:05.96]无论做什么事
[00:08.95]我都觉得身心舒畅
[00:14.05]醒来时 感觉自己就是全民偶像
[00:16.84]我梳着头 头发像古人那样乌黑亮丽
[00:19.98]我感觉很兴奋 像是回到了去年夏天的某个夜晚
[00:26.06]你穿着红色的裙子 亭亭玉立
[00:29.05]像万人迷 像女王 像是年轻时候的Jane Fonda
[00:32.05]这是真正的我吗 还是因为我今年运势不错
[00:36.43]最近 我身心舒畅
[00:39.40]从头到脚 都很舒爽
[00:42.43]无论做什么事
[00:45.44]我都觉得身心舒畅
[00:49.85]我感觉
[00:50.76]也许我应该把我的舞蹈记录下来
[00:54.35]说不定还能卖点钱
[00:57.69]因为我身心舒畅
[01:02.47]一定是我上辈子积了德
[01:05.44]才会一帆风顺 绿灯看起来像棕榈树
[01:08.45]播放的每一首歌 都像是为我量身定做
[01:12.34]回到家里 感觉我就是歌手Post Malone
[01:17.15]坐在那儿 身边有美人相伴 感觉我就是人生赢家
[01:19.96]现在 我们成功了
[01:21.74]去年的经历一言难尽
[01:25.12]最近 我身心舒畅
[01:27.92]从头到脚 都很舒爽
[01:30.93]无论做什么事
[01:33.95]我都觉得身心舒畅
[01:38.27]我感觉

[01:43.08]说不定还能卖点钱
[01:46.01]因为我身心舒畅
[01:51.25]身心舒畅

[02:06.15]我梳着头 头发像古人那样乌黑亮丽
